column4: I have a Core2Duo T5600 processor in my laptop, is it worth using 64-bit ubuntu instead of 32-bit or is it still unstable and/ or pointless?
there's hope, adobe just released a 64bit flash, which is the main sore spot (for me, anyway)
tuna, Shishire, elliotjhug: I have 1gb ram so would there be little performance advantage?
